content: HomeBlogSeema Shah Senior Director of Research and Analytics Seema Shah Seema Shah, New York, NY. Seema Shah is the Senior Director of Research and Analytics at Similarweb. She has over 20 years of experience in consumer/retail sector research and analysis. Prior to joining Similarweb, Ms. Shah was a senior consumer sector analyst at Granite Capital and Privet Capital, where she initiated, researched and recommended investments for the portfolios. She also worked in investment banking and private equity at Credit Suisse First Boston and Stone Point Capital. Most recently, she covered consumer and retail companies for the Bloomberg Intelligence platform, as well as at Creditntell, a credit research company. Ms. Shah received her MBA from Columbia Business School and BA from The Johns Hopkins University.
